title: The Writer's Almanac for Monday, May 9, 2022
description: “I write to annoy God, to make Death laugh. I write because I can’t get it right. I write because I want every woman in the world to fall in love with me.” –Charles Simic, born on this day in 1938.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
